english.segment1: Oh la da da la da da la da da da. Oh la da da la da da la da da. Oh la da da la da da la da da da. Oh la da da la da da la da da
english.segment2: You are God. You are King. You are holy. Lord of everything. You are my peace. When I am restless. Yea, You are the hope that burns through my darkness, yea
english.segment3: You are God. Yea, You are King. Oh, You are holy. Lord of everything. You are my peace. When I am restless. Yea, You are the hope that burns through my darkness
english.segment4: And so I sing woah to You. Yea I sing woah to You
english.segment5: Holy is our Lord. Holy is our King. Holy is Your power. And Your graceful majesty. Holy is our father. Holy is our peace. We give our lives to You. We surrender
english.segment6: Halleluiah. Halleluiah (background). Halleluiah. Halleluiah. Halleluiah (background). Halleluiah
english.segment7: So I sing woah to You. Yea I sing woah to You. The angels sing woah to You. Lord hear us sing, woah to You
english.segment8: Holy is our Lord. Holy is our King. Holy is Your power. And Your graceful majesty. Holy is our father. Holy is our peace. We give our lives to You. We surrender
english.segment9: Holy is our Lord. Holy is our King. Holy is Your power. And Your graceful majesty. Holy is our father. Holy is our peace. We give our lives to You. We surrender everything
english.segment10: Oh la da da la da da la da da da. Oh la da da la da da la da da. Oh la da da la da da la da da da. Oh la da da la da da la da da
